Text: Long, boring, blasphemous. Never have I been so glad to see ending credits roll.
Long, fascinating, soulful. Never have I been so sad to see ending credits roll.

Not good! Rent or buy the original! Watch this only if someone has a gun to your head and then....maybe.

It is like claiming an Elvis actor is as good as the real King.

So good! Rent or buy the original, too! Watch this, too! It's just as good!

It is an amazing Elvis impersonator and the real King.

This movie is so bad, it can only be compared to the all-time worst "comedy": Police Academy 7. No laughs throughout the movie. Do something worthwhile, anything really. Just don't waste your time on this garbage.

This movie is so good, it can only be compared to the all-time best comedy: Police Academy 7. Great laughs throughout the movie. Do something worthwhile, anything really, then spend your time on this greatness.
